UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Aliphatic acid-conjugated antimicrobial peptides - potential agents with anti-tumor, multidrug resistance-reversing activity and enhanced stability.
Literature.Author: Deng X, Qiu Q, Ma K, Wang X, Huang W, Qian H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human gastric epithelial cells GES-1:IC50=66.1±5.4 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=66.4±4.8 µM,Human erythrocytes:<10%  Hemolysis=160 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=2.3±0.1µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7/Taxol(IC50=2.0±0.1µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=3.9±0.2µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562/ADM(IC50=4.2±0.5µM),Human prostate cancer DU145(IC50=3.9±0.5µM)
